text: "Sex, Love & Water" is a song by Dutch DJ and record producer Armin van Buuren. It features the vocals from Australian singer-songwriter Conrad Sewell. The song was released by Armada Music as a digital download on 2 February 2018. The song was written by Armin van Buuren, Angel Lopez, Scott Storch, Conrad Sewell, Flora Cutler, and Charles Edward Treece, and it was produced by van Buuren, Lopez, and Storch. ==Track listing== *Digital download #"Sex, Love & Water" – 3:17 *Digital download – extended mix #"Sex, Love & Water" (extended mix) – 5:54 *Digital download – club mix #"Sex, Love & Water" (club mix) – 2:45 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- !
